definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Housing provident fund in the development of our region, some problems still exist.
sentences.chinese: 我区的住房公积金在发展中仍然存在着一些问题。

sentences.english: A valid write to the scratchpad will clear the PF bit.
sentences.chinese: 一个有效的写入暂存器将清除公积金位。

sentences.english: to administer the information system of housing provident fund.
sentences.chinese: 管理住房公积金信息系统。

sentences.english: Legion II flashlights at CPF Marketplace.
sentences.chinese: 二军团在中央公积金手电筒市场。

sentences.english: What are the key changes under the CPF reform?
sentences.chinese: 重点是什么变化，根据中央公积金制度改革呢？

sentences.english: Shanghai to reduce two suites Fund Loan.
sentences.chinese: 上海调低二套房公积金贷款。

sentences.english: The threshold of housing public accumulation funds in Beijing was raised.
sentences.chinese: 北京提高了住房公积金月缴存额上限。

sentences.english: No significant CPF effects were detected in males.
sentences.chinese: 公积金的影响无显着性检测男性。

sentences.english: The savings to be transferred should enter into his pension account.
sentences.chinese: 转入的个人账户存款额计入其本人公积金养老专户内。

sentences.english: And when workers about to retire lose their jobs, they can dig into their CPF savings on time.
sentences.chinese: 快退休的人失业，则差不多可以按时领公积金。

sentences.english: The other mainstay is the Central Provident Fund.
sentences.chinese: 另一重点就是中央公积金。

sentences.english: So leave your money in your CPF accounts to enjoy this extra interest.
sentences.chinese: 因此，留在你的公积金帐户的钱享受这额外利息。

sentences.english: This is around the housing accumulation fund in recent years, a typical criminal case.
sentences.chinese: 这是近年来各地住房公积金犯罪中的一个典型案件。

sentences.english: A state-owned enterprise may withdraw the discretional and legal accumulation funds in combination.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业可以将任意公积金与法定公积金合并提取。

sentences.english: A state-owned enterprise may withdraw the discretional and legal accumulation funds in combination.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业可以将任意公积金与法定公积金合并提取。

personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
